prompt: Cinematic wide shot of a rain-slick school car park at twilight: a mirror-finish red Ferrari catches the sodium glow while three faceless figures in surgical-green masks, high rubber boots and tilted pointed hats stand frozen in an equilateral triangle around it, backs to camera, ominous calm.
Dolly-in past the viewer’s shoulder: sodium lamps strobe, a key glowing in hand; the green-men tilt their masked heads and the Ferrari’s rippling red hood lifts like an awakening predator.

Zoom in on the glowing key-ring now orbiting your raised palm; tilt down so the three green masks fill frame as they turn their keys in mid-air, the wet Ferrari doors yawning open like mirrored mouths ready to swallow the reversing car.

Camera snap-zooms into overlapping windshields; driver-ghosts phase through each other, the lot kaleidoscoping into mirror shards racing past. Spin the frame as the green-masked sprinters orbit, upside-down asphalt whirling— blood-red Ferrari still surging reverse, trailing doubled after-images.

Snap to inside the idling Ferrari: driver’s POV as the cabin gently rocks, the outside world now a slow-spinning carousel; pan across the dash—ember-glowing brass keys hover then stab into every slot at once—while the rear-view mirror shows the exit ramp flicker between forward and reverse.

Zoom slowly into the smallest visor mirror—the one reflection still facing forward—until the rest of the multiplying glass and green faces melt into a blur behind it, while the Ferrari’s cabin lighting pivots so the viewer appears trapped inside the mirror’s calm driver.

Zoom tighter on the rear-view: only the calm “awake” reflection remains; others dissolve into green static swipe as masks smear away. Camera tilts with the real key now turning from R to D, headlights pop alive, and the ramp un-erases itself in the glass.
Let camera drift past open driver window, show you (mirrored) glancing back at the dazed newcomer, then forward as your hatchback rolls toward the exit—mirroring the choice to leave.
Pull camera through windshield to ordinary street; ghost hatchback races backward in rear-view mirror, key glows green in lifted hand.

Shift camera inside rear-view mirror: the breathed-on Ferrari melts into green chrome infant asleep on back seat, hatchback—now ID-tag "241123_1847"—looms outside mirror as the only exit ramp curves back through pupil.

Pull camera back through driver-side window; show console screen now booting the dreamsim terminal, its green glow climbing the windshield like mold while the rear-view mirrors silently birth a 4th sentinel in the back seat.

Pivot camera overhead: the three green masks now hover at hatchback corners, forming an exact 120° triangle that rotates counterclockwise while their bodies stay frozen; asphalt melts into a perfect glowing Δ beneath the tires.

Zoom in on the hatchback’s rearview; the doppelgänger’s eyes snap open green and the reflected parking lot spins backward while the actual lot holds still. Panic the camera 10° clockwise so the guardian triangle’s boots flash chartreuse as they stride toward the rolling tire, masks tilting to “watch” the reversal.

Camera whip-pans from glowing terminal to the parking triangle: green-masks pivot in unison toward lens, gloves dripping oily glyphs as the empty car screeches forward—now looming in rearview, headlights pulsing like a cursor.
